Package org.brentloaf.displaylib.full.Objects.ItemBuilder

Class ItemBuilder

java.lang.Object
org.brentloaf.displaylib.core.Objects.ItemBuilder.AbstractItemBuilder<ItemBuilder>
org.brentloaf.displaylib.full.Objects.ItemBuilder.ItemBuilder
public final class ItemBuilder extends org.brentloaf.displaylib.core.Objects.ItemBuilder.AbstractItemBuilder<ItemBuilder>
ItemBuilder is meant to return dynamic items that change depending on the context or viewer.
